rules.name: primary-key-required
rules.description: All tables must have a primary key defined

rules.name: foreign-key-indexes
rules.description: All foreign key columns should have indexes

rules.name: timestamp-columns
rules.description: Tables should have created_at and updated_at timestamp columns

rules.name: naming-convention
rules.description: Table names should be plural, column names should be snake_case

rules.name: no-reserved-keywords
rules.description: Column names should not use SQL reserved keywords

rules.name: varchar-length
rules.description: VARCHAR columns should specify a maximum length

rules.name: not-null-constraints
rules.description: Primary keys and foreign keys should have NOT NULL constraints

rules.name: default-values
rules.description: Columns should have appropriate default values where applicable
